results.deck: Rallisport Challenge features some the world's finest low-displacement, highly turbocharged 4WD cars drifting over special stages as disparate as streets, snow, ice, gravel, tarmac, and just about everything else in pursuit of victory and the fastest time.
results.name: RalliSport Challenge

results.deck: Monopoly Party is a revamp of the classic board game that allows up to four players to play simultaneously. It has support for the classic turn-based play-style as well as a party mode where all players take turns at the same time.
results.name: Monopoly Party

results.deck: Based on the unpopular movie of the same name. After fire-breathing dragons awaken and nearly annihilate the human race, players take on the role of a survivor using scavenged military hardware to fight back, or become a dragon themselves and finish off the humans once and for all.
results.name: Reign of Fire

results.deck: Players control Rhama Sabrier who must stop the evil Jabez from wreaking havoc across the seven seas.
results.name: Galleon

results.deck: NHL 2K6 was the first NHL game to hit next-gen consoles with a release on the Xbox360.
results.name: NHL 2K6

results.deck: In Psi-Ops: The Mindgate Conspiracy the player assumes the role of Nick Scryer, an amnesiac with latent psychic abilities. Join Nick as he seeks to uncover the motives behind "The Movement" and recover his forgotten memories.
results.name: Psi-Ops: The Mindgate Conspiracy

results.deck: A game based on the cartoon that aired on Nickelodeon.
results.name: Fairly OddParents: Breakin' Da Rules

results.deck: Bloody Roar Extreme is the Xbox port of Bloody Roar 3. It had the same special features as Bloody Roar Primal Fury for Gamecube.
results.name: Bloody Roar Extreme

results.deck: Metal Dungeon is an RPG dungeon crawler featuring randomized maps.
results.name: Metal Dungeon

results.deck: Based on a true story, take control of your squad and lead your brothers in arms to victory though France and suppress the German forces.
results.name: Brothers in Arms: Road to Hill 30

results.deck: FIFA 06 boasts anew intuitive game play engine for a fast and attacking experience.
results.name: FIFA Soccer 06

results.deck: Destroy All Humans! 2 is the sequel to the popular game in which you play an extra-terrestrial destroying human beings.
results.name: Destroy All Humans! 2

results.deck: Club Football 2005 is the most recent release of Codemaster's Club Football series and was released in 16 different versions
results.name: Club Football 2005

results.deck: This run-of-the-mill action game, released shortly before Revenge of the Sith hit theaters, putting you in the shoes of Anakin Skywalker as he battles with Count Dooku, General Grievous, and most importantly, himself.
results.name: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith

results.deck: Fifa 2004 lets you "Create Brilliance" with its exclusive "Off the Ball" Control System.
results.name: FIFA Soccer 2004
World War II Combat: Iwo Jima

results.deck: When they visit a spot where they used to play as children, the twin sisters Mio and Mayu suddenly find themselves in a village where night is eternal. With only a magic camera to defend themselves, they have to solve the village's mystery while defending themselves from evil spirits.
results.name: Fatal Frame II: Crimson Butterfly

results.deck: SpongeBob and friends compete for the role of the villain in the new Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy movie.
results.name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Lights, Camera, Pants!

results.deck: A spin off of the Tony Hawk Pro Skater series and part of Activision's O2 line of extreme sports games, Kelly Slater's Pro Surfer is a surfing game in which allows players experience the thrill of riding the waves from the comfort of their living room.
results.name: Kelly Slater's Pro Surfer

results.deck: In this third-person Sci-Fi action-adventure game, you take the role of Gideon Wyeth, an unlikely hero who unlocks the extraordinary power which lies dormant within each human, and must use his new abilities to defeat a powerful alien race... or face the extinction of humanity.
results.name: Advent Rising

results.deck: The college football season is back for the 2003 season with NCAA Football 2003 featuring Joey Harrington on the cover.
results.name: NCAA Football 2003

results.deck: In Men of Valor you play as Dean Shepard, a young Marine in the United States Marine Corps, trying to stay alive with his squad in the harsh jungles of Vietnam.
results.name: Men of Valor

results.deck: Fly through the air on a broom as Harry and friends while playing the wizarding world's favorite sport, Quidditch.
results.name: Harry Potter: Quidditch World Cup

results.deck: A chess game featuring extras like puzzles of the day and fantasy-style battles.
results.name: Chessmaster

results.deck: When the beautiful Ann Darrow is kidnapped by the inhabitants of Skull Island, Jack and his team must fight their way through the island's prehistoric inhabitants and hostile environments, solving puzzles and fending off attackers, all in search of her. But unfortunately for them, so is a giant ape.
results.name: Peter Jackson's King Kong: The Official Game of the Movie

results.deck: Sonic Heroes introduces a character-switching mechanic, with teams of three characters each dividing the work of smashing robots and saving the world between themselves, and with each character contributing their specialty to the team: Speed, Power, or Flight.
results.name: Sonic Heroes

results.deck: Kung Fu Chaos, also known as Kung Fu Panic in Japan, is a 3D brawler where battle takes place on levels parodying blockbuster movies.
results.name: Kung Fu Chaos

results.deck: The sequel to Fifa Street, featuring more tricks and gameplay modes than the original.
results.name: FIFA Street 2

results.deck: Be prepared to put those plastic, LEGO lightsabers to work as you rebel against the Galactic Empire in LucasArts' second installment of the LEGO Star Wars series.
results.name: LEGO Star Wars II: The Original Trilogy

results.deck: EA's Need for Speed series returns for it's second iteration of illegal street racing in Underground 2. New to this game is the ability to roam around an open-world city,newer racing modes like Street X and URL and much deeper customisation.
results.name: Need for Speed Underground 2

results.deck: A game based on the Corvette car.
results.name: Corvette

results.deck: Drive one of many vehicles of destruction through three cities on your way to become overlord.
results.name: RoadKill

results.deck: NBA 2K7 is the eighth installment of the NBA 2K series of realistic basketball games, updating the roster to the 2006/2007 NBA season while improving the online play and adding every athlete's "signature style".
results.name: NBA 2K7

results.deck: NBA Street Vol. 2 is the second game in the NBA Street series. It continues the over-the-top ridiculous style of the first one while adding a few new aspects to the game play.
results.name: NBA Street Vol. 2

results.deck: The sequel to one of the most acclaimed PC games of all time, Deus Ex: Invisible War throws you into a divided world, where multiple factions wish to take advantage of your cybernetic abilities. Playing as Alex D., you make your own path through corrupt leaders and worldwide conspiracies.
results.name: Deus Ex: Invisible War

results.deck: Shattered Union is a turn-based strategy game that follows the event of a fictional second American Civil War. The player can control up to seven playable factions, six of which are splinter states and one which represents the European Union.
results.name: Shattered Union

results.deck: Street Racing Syndicate is an Import Tuner racing game that focuses on wowing the ladies
results.name: SRS: Street Racing Syndicate

results.deck: NBA Ballers is a basketball game developed and published by Midway, for the Xbox, PS2 and PSP.
results.name: NBA Ballers

results.deck: UEFA Champions League 20062007 is the official video game of the UEFA Champions League 2006/2007 season.
results.name: UEFA Champions League 2006-2007

results.deck:
This game is based on the third season of the 2003 TMNT series.

In the PS2 and Xbox-versions the TMNT: Turtles in Time Arcade-game is unlocked after completing the first level.
results.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 3: Mutant Nightmare

results.deck: Scarface: The World is yours, puts you in the shoes of Tony Montana as you try to re-establish your Cocaine Empire and get back the glory days of the past.
results.name: Scarface: The World is Yours

results.deck: Full Spectrum Warrior is based on a game commissioned by the US Army to train light infantry troops in urban combat situations. The game places soldiers in a tense, hostile, and claustrophobic environment where they must complete a variety of military objectives.
results.name: Full Spectrum Warrior

results.deck: MVP Baseball 2005 is a baseball game from EA Sports. This game was EA Sports' last licensed MLB game. The announcers are Duane Kuiper and Mike Krukow.
results.name: MVP Baseball 2005

results.deck: Club football is a soccer game that came out in 18 different editions.
results.name: Club Football

results.deck: A World War II themed action game.
results.name: Panzer Elite Action: Fields of Glory

results.deck: A Cabela's deer hunting game.
results.name: Cabela's Deer Hunt: 2004 Season

results.deck: Set in the most beautiful locations in the world, Outrun 2 is an arcade-style racing game that puts you in the driver's seat of eight different Ferrari's.
results.name: OutRun 2

results.deck: X-Men Next Dimension is a 3D fighting game featuring characters like Cyclops, Wolverine, Magneto, Rogue, and many more.  It is the spiritual successor to the Mutant Academy games.
results.name: X-Men: Next Dimension

results.deck: A spin-off of Koei's Dynasty Warriors series, Samurai Warriors adapts the hack-and-slash gamplay and changes the setting from Three Kingdoms China to Warring States Japan.
results.name: Samurai Warriors

results.deck: When a double agent discovers information on red mercury, Frank Hayden is chosen to hunt down who's responsible before they distribute it to terrorists.
results.name: Shadow Ops: Red Mercury

results.deck: Blade II is a 2002 action game based on the vampire/comic book movie of the same name, starring Wesley Snipes.
results.name: Blade II

results.deck: Pick a BMX rider and ride around 8 different levels to complete challenges or free ride to do crazy tricks.
results.name: Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX 2

results.deck: Hunter: The Reckoning is a hack-and-slash RPG based on White Wolf's tabletop RPG of the same name.  It supports 4-player co-op.
results.name: Hunter: The Reckoning

results.deck: The follow-up to Medal of Honor: Rising Sun returns the action to the European Theater, along with North Africa and Stalingrad.
results.name: Medal of Honor: European Assault

results.deck: A collection of vintage, real-world Gottlieb tables.
results.name: Pinball Hall of Fame: The Gottlieb Collection

results.deck: Championship Manager 2006 is a soccer management game for the 2005/2006 season. You take control of your favorite soccer teams from around the world and lead them to glory.
results.name: Championship Manager 2006

results.deck: Race through obstacles and battle the clock in this simulation. Collect points to unlock bigger and better remote control helicopters.
results.name: RC Helicopter Indoor Adventure

results.deck: Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius is a tie-in to the movie of the same name.
results.name: Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius

results.deck: NBA 2K3 is the fourth installment of the NBA 2K series of realistic basketball games, updating the roster to the 2002/2003 NBA season while adding online multiplayer (for the PlayStation 2 and Xbox versions) and co-branding with the ESPN.
results.name: NBA 2K3

results.deck: An action and stealth game based on the 1963 Steve McQueen film.
results.name: The Great Escape

results.deck: Rayman Arena is a party game featuring Rayman. Up to four players can run through race tracks or compete in an arena.
results.name: Rayman Arena
Dr. Seuss' The Cat in the Hat

results.deck: The 2002 release in Sega's football franchise. It was one of the first PS2 games to support online play.
results.name: NFL 2K3

results.deck: Using the Duplication 3000 machine, Plankton creates an army of robots to invade Bikini Bottom. Help Spongebob, Patrick and Sandy thwart Plankton's evil plans and save the day.
results.name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Battle for Bikini Bottom

results.deck: Take a host of ghosts and show the people of Gravenville who's boss!
results.name: Ghost Master
Robin Hood: Defender of the Crown

results.deck: The sequel to the original Deer Hunt game.
results.name: Cabela's Deer Hunt: 2005 Season

results.deck: An arena fighter featuring Looney Tunes characters.
results.name: Loons: The Fight for Fame

results.deck: Without Warning, published by Capcom.
results.name: Without Warning

results.deck: Predator: concrete jungle is a 3rd person action/adventure. In the game you play as a predator who is disgraced because humans have stolen his technology and you must hunt them down and regain your gear and honor .
results.name: Predator: Concrete Jungle

results.deck: Play as D-Tritus in this action adventure game produced by American Mcgee!
results.name: American McGee presents SCRAPLAND

results.deck: A sequel to the original Bubble Bobble title from Taito, featuring the now human Bub and Bob. It incorporated the use of Rainbows as both a weapon to defeat enemies and as a platform to climb the levels.
results.name: Rainbow Islands

results.deck: James Sunderland tries to locate his wife in the eponymous town of Silent Hill in the first sequel to the 1999 PlayStation horror game. It is the first installment of the Silent Hill series on the PlayStation 2.
results.name: Silent Hill 2

results.deck: ThinkTanks is a fast-paced online multiplayer tank combat game developed by BraveTree Productions and GarageGames.
results.name: ThinkTanks

results.deck: A first-person subterranean RPG in the tradition of Ultima Underworld, Arx Fatalis takes place in a world where the surface is no longer hospitable, and follows the story of a man who awakens there with no memory of his purpose or identity.
results.name: Arx Fatalis

results.deck: Madden NFL 2002 was the first game to feature the expansion team, The Houston Texans and Daunte Culpepper was the player on the cover of the game.
results.name: Madden NFL 2002

results.deck: Based on a cartoon on Nickelodeon, Avatar: The Last Airbender is an action game that puts you in the role of Aang, a young and powerful airbender. Console Version was developed by THQ Studio Australia.
results.name: Avatar: The Last Airbender

results.deck: Freedom Fighters is an alternate history squad-based shooter from IO Interactive, critically hailed for its simple yet deep squad mechanics.
results.name: Freedom Fighters

results.deck: This is the second game based on the 2003 TMNT series.
results.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 2: Battle Nexus

results.deck: A game based on the small toy cars.
results.name: Hot Wheels: Stunt Track Challenge

results.deck: Splashdown is a racing game for the Xbox and Playstation 2
results.name: Splashdown

results.deck: Xbox Version of the hit Onimusha Warlords.  You follow the young samurai Samansosuke as he searches for Princess Yuki in Inabayama Castle.
results.name: Genma Onimusha

results.deck: Hitman: Blood Money is a 3rd person action-adventure game released by Eidos in 2006. The game is a continuation of the popular Hitman franchise in which the player takes control of the mysterious assassin, Agent 47.
results.name: Hitman: Blood Money

results.deck: Super Returns is an open world tie-in to the film. It features story missions based on saving the city of Metropolis, and 80 square miles of free roaming goodness. Also, the final boss battle is a tornado.
results.name: Superman Returns

results.deck: Jurassic Park: Operation Genesis is a game that allows you to build and manage your own dino-themed park. Building upon basic simulation/tycoon games Jurassic Park: Operation Genesis offers unique innovations that help it define and attach itself to the well known movie franchise.
results.name: Jurassic Park: Operation Genesis

results.deck: Escape From Butcher Bay is a first-person action game set before the events of the first Riddick film, Pitch Black.
results.name: The Chronicles of Riddick: Escape from Butcher Bay

results.deck: Activision's open world adventure game puts you in the role of an undercover Los Angeles Cop.
results.name: True Crime: Streets of LA

results.deck: An action game in which you are hunted by genetically-engineered dinosaurs aboard a derelict starship 545 years in the future.
results.name: Dino Crisis 3
